reviews.author: Randy Kadow
reviews.text: The main waterline on my house sprung a leak. We diagnosed the leak, called Clog Pro and they had water restored to our home within 15 hours of calling. Quality work, quick response and all for a fair price. Thank you to Kenny in the office and the professional plumber (don’t recall his name)!!

reviews.author: M
reviews.text: Hold on to your wallet because that's what will drain.  Dishonest and poor quality work.

reviews.author: S Gray
reviews.text: Update July 2020:  called them again to deal with toilet not draining properly.  Again, very prompt, courteous, and helpful.  Recommend them.  Clog Pro responded very quickly to my request for help with repairs to a leaky bathtub faucet (leaking hot water at a pretty good clip).  The plumber (Dan) was prompt, courteous, practical, and very helpful. I ended up also getting a quote for additional plumbibg work I need to have done, and I really appreciated Dan's reasonable and thorough approach to helping me with all of it.

reviews.author: Lydia Lunacy
reviews.text: The wonderful man Louis worked so hard on our kitchen sink and gave us some great advice on what to do and what not to do. This is the guy you want to ask for to work on all your plumbing needs! Thank you so much again!!!! We can finally do our dishes! Haha

reviews.author: Dora Dora
reviews.text: We just had Clog Pro's service today. They did a superb job. They came shortly after our call, fixed the clogged sewer line and explained things very well. They went above and beyond. We are very satisfied and will recommend their service.

reviews.author: Carolyn J. Rose, Author
reviews.text: Thanks to Jesse, Victor, Franny, Louis, Kim, and Marsh, I got a sewer line repair bid I could live with and the work went faster than I imagined it could. They even reseeded a portion of the lawn and replanted a shrub that had to come up so they could lay new pipe.

reviews.author: M T
reviews.text: Louis Griffith was able to flush a common drain line that other companies had scoped and quoted replacement.  We still need a good rain to make sure it all worked but he was very confident it will.  He was able to locate a catch basin and enter the pipe from there.    Another company had dug down and cut the pipe to see what was going on. He was able to figure it out and take care of the job.

reviews.author: Kenny Withers
reviews.text: Great Service!

reviews.author: Benjamin Doan
reviews.text: Clog Pro sent out a professional that quickly resolved my problem and provided a future suggestion. Excellent work!

reviews.author: Shawn Stires
reviews.text: Robert has fixed a few leaks and clogs over the years great guy great service .

reviews.author: Scott Soukup
reviews.text: Our technician Kevin was courteous and efficient.  Clog Pro was very responsive, helpful, and prompt.

reviews.author: Miles Paulson
reviews.text: We came home to a flooded kitchen and a backed up sink. I called every plumber on Google and was told they either don't do drains or won't be able to help for a few days. Finally had a plumber who's drain equipment was broken recommend clogpro. Gave them a call and they had a technician out within the hour. The technicians name was Konner Schoenborn, and He was very respectful and very thorough. Answered all of my questions and cleaned up the mess under the sink after he was done. They were also very well priced, it was much less than i was expecting it to cost. They also stand behind their work and informed me that if I experience another backup or clog in the next 60 days they would come back out free of charge.

reviews.author: Victoria Paulson
reviews.text: Came home to a flooded kitchen. Required a plumber ASAP! Husband called and they were the only ones that came out same day! Did an awesome job! Friendly and most of all our hero! Konner Schoenborn was our plumbing hero! Cannot thank you enough!

reviews.author: Kara Kiedrowski
reviews.text: Wonderful experience!!  Didn’t like the answer I got but that’s what you get with 80 yr old pipes.  Thank you again

reviews.author: Amy Schutzer
reviews.text: I want to sing the praises of Clog Pro. They are a company of integrity, honesty and expertise. Their knowledge saved me many thousands of dollars as they were able to correctly diagnose the issues my rain drain and laundry drain were having. Louis came out and by investigating the issues, and using the knowledge his many years of experience provided, easily and competently fixed the problem. I can't say enough good things about dealing with this company. I will be recommending them to everyone I know. Thank you Louis and Jesse and Clog Pro!

reviews.author: T Van Patten-Dunn
reviews.text: Konner came out to my place of business and worked diligently to clear drains that we've had problems with for years and many other plumbers have attempted to fix. He asked a lot of questions to problem solve and got us moving along beautifully. He gave a great product recommendation that I've now purchased for my home and place of work. When he left, the place was spotless and (aside from the excellent working drains) you wouldn't even know he'd been there. Will DEFINITELY use again and specifically request him.

reviews.author: Stephen Smith
reviews.text: quick, efficient and professional. I would recommend.

reviews.author: Jen Fontaine
reviews.text: Our Experience with Clog Pro was fantastic.  Nobody wants to have a clogged drain issue, but if you need the service, call these guys!  Our technician was Louis and he was very fast, efficient, and knowledgeable.  Got the job done for us and left a ton of tips and advice we can definitely use.  We received a notice 30 minutes before he arrived and even a follow up call to be sure we were satisfied with the service.  10 stars for Clog Pro.

reviews.author: Lewis Skiles
reviews.text: The Clog Pro truck with trailer moved into my lane on Fourth Plain and had to slam on my breaks to keep from getting hit. When I honked the driver flipped me off and cursed at me - real professional

reviews.author: Rob Lutz
reviews.text: I needed someone on New Years Eve, and after several phone calls to different plumbers, Clog Pro was the first one to have someone available that day.  I was pleasantly surprised, considering the difficulty of getting someone that day, of the price as well.  They were out within a few hours and Konner was professional and got everything taken care of, cleaned up, and in working order in a matter respecting my time.  I'd recommend Clog Pro.

reviews.author: Parker Butler
reviews.text: Honest work and get the job done.

reviews.author: Jolena S
reviews.text: Louis was very responsive, knowledgeable and efficient for a Saturday! I would recommend this company!

reviews.author: Meghan Kelly
reviews.text: We own an older rental home with old plumbing. This team is responsive, reliable, and efficient. Everyone that I spoke with was both kind and honest. Conner performed the on-site work and he was an incredibly good communicator. I trusted his recommendations and appreciated his clear explanations.

reviews.author: Jack Butler
reviews.text: Konher did a bang up job, very respectful and like last time, I definitely will not be going anywhere else. Thanks Konher

reviews.author: Max Kelemen
reviews.text: Thanks Louis! Super quick and efficient and very friendly. Definitely recommend.

reviews.author: Jon Ericsen
reviews.text: Loius was great! Fast and clean

reviews.author: matt anderson
reviews.text: Louis did a great job!

reviews.author: doughnutguy82
reviews.text: Had Louis come out and take care of a Stubborn clog that i couldnt manage. They got it taken care of very quickly and cleanly. Both were very professional with me and answered all of my questions with detail. They even clued me into the fact that i have a septic tank, and not city sewer (i had no idea) Appreciate yall taking care of us in a quick and clean fashion. will definitely call again, should the need arise. thank you!

reviews.author: Tim Gardner
reviews.text: Amazing group of clog experts. Don't call a plumber when you have a clog.

reviews.author: Maria Isaac
reviews.text: Louis came out and helped our salon company! He was fast and efficient and very professional! We will definitely use again and refer to friends!

reviews.author: John Bucsek
reviews.text: We contacted Clog Pro to diagnose and clear a backed up sewer.  Our tech was Louis and he was friendly and competent.  He cleared the rootball that was causing the issue and then scoped the drain and explained what caused the problem and the best course of action.  The work was done quickly and affordably. Louis took the time to explain what was done and was happy to answer any questions.  The video of the sewer inspection was posted within a few hours for our review. I would recommend getting a quote from them if you're having issues with your sewer.

reviews.author: Bric Mason
reviews.text: If you want a plumbing service that's going to bill you what they say they're going to bill you, don't use Clog pro.

reviews.author: Stacy Dunn
reviews.text: These guys are amazing. I have used them for business and residential plumbing needs and they are fabulous. Louis has been WONDERFUL to work with. He is always on time and prepared for any job. We had a significant blockage in a septic line in a house we just purchased that needed immediate attention. Louis was there first thing on a Sunday morning to take care of it and had the whole house back up and running within an hour. We opted for a scope just so we knew what we were dealing with and to establish a baseline and we received an explanation about what we were seeing on the screen to really understand what we were looking at. The prices are very reasonable for the quality of service and Clog Pro will be my go to for plumbing needs moving forward. Highly recommended.

reviews.author: John P
reviews.text: I was concerned about replacing the waste pipe in my front yard. I had just installed new concrete curbing around my flower beds. I had Just had my underground irrigation pipes replaced. After watching my neighbors get their line replaced, I thought it advisable to have mine checked, so I called Clog Pro to have mine scoped. I discover that my waste line is both broken, and restricted! As I gaze across the street to view the brown "skunk Stripe" and assorted rocks & debris in my neighbor's yard after completion, I think about the recent curbing and new sprinkler lines being destroyed. I requested estimates from several companies, including Clog Pro. The estimates were varied and uninspiring. After they viewed the video of the pipe they said "we gotta tear up the street", or "no, we don't have to"... "you have to personally get a permit from the city", or "no you don't need a permit", "we have to break your curbing and sprinkler lines", or "well, we will TRY to save them", YIKES! Clog pro came out and explained the process in great detail, and offered options based on what they may find underground. Yes, the city DOES require a permit, and they will get it for me. They will also arrange for the required locating service for gas lines etc, and all required inspections. The process will be seamless and painless, totally turn key for me. They assured me that they would not break my curbing, and if they had to remove sprinkler lines, they would be cut, and repaired, not ripped out and left. They assured me they would restore the yard to pre-dig condition, and all for a competitive price! Sounds to good to be true! Everyone knows how salespeople lie, right? But they HAD been VERY professional, from the time of the scoping right up to the estimate, so I agreed to their proposal. How did it turn out?? Just like they said it would!!! I can barely tell they were here! They even raked the grass they had flattened  in the process! Check out the pictures during, and after, see if you agree! Clog pro people, I couldn't be happier! You guys are AWESOME!

reviews.author: Jon Field
reviews.text: Always the best company.  Owner and staff are fair and fantastic not to mention competent. This is the second 5 star review I have posted for clog pro

reviews.author: Laurel Miller
reviews.text: Very pleased with my service from Clog Pro! It started with me calling last Thursday, and I got the appointment set for the following Monday (today) with an 8-10am window. I received a 15 min call ahead of time to confirm I was home and ready for the appointment, within my window.   Louis was so friendly, personable and professional. He was great at explaining the work he was doing as he did it, and answered all the questions I asked in a way that was very easy to understand. He was able to take care of my drain issue in a very timely manner and gave me a couple tips and recommendations for the future. I did not feel he was trying to push any sales agenda or drag out the repairs, as they work at an hourly rate.  The prices are very good for needing to bring the truck & trailer, all the equipment and the experience and knowledge they provide for the job.  This is one of those times when it's nerve wrecking as a homeowner, not knowing what could come up, but Louis got us fixed up quickly and efficiently and I couldn't be happier! Thanks Louis & Clog Pro!

reviews.author: Liza Alberhardt
reviews.text: The service we received was excellent. Louis was very knowledgeable in his job. He was polite and he had amazing customer service. Will recommend highly to all our families and community.

reviews.author: John Copeland
reviews.text: Louis was great. Went above and beyond. Gave info I didn’t know. Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Kayla Roth
reviews.text: I just had to come in here and give these guys a great review!!! If I could give them 20 stars I would!! Came out due to some plumbing issues and we had Patrick who was so kind and polite keeping not only me in the loop but my husband who was at work!! Amazing and went above and beyond to help out!! Not only did he keep us updated but was totally honest and not trying to upsale us!!! Definitely will recommend this company to our friends an family!!!

reviews.author: Misty White
reviews.text: I got a courtesy call before the technician arrived and they stuck to their promised timetable that was given at scheduling (10 minutes early even!!) . Louis was friendly and efficient.  Rates reasonable.

reviews.author: Ted Scubaguy
reviews.text: Called on a Saturday afternoon, they had Louis out on Sunday morning. No extra charge for weekends!  He determined where the trouble was, main sewer line from the house, found the clean out, (under a deck that had been built by previous homeowners), went and did another job while I cut an access hole in the deck, returned with jet blaster and camera, scopes it and cleared the clog (there is no such thing as a “flushable “ wipe, FYI), then found and blasted out a bunch of roots that were the “root cause” of the clog.  Louis was efficient, professional and informative, showed the video and got it all done with no mess. It’s been two weeks now and all good. I am sure we’ll be good for years till the roots slowly grow back. I highly recommend these folks!  Responsive, friendly, professional and they get it done!

reviews.author: David Saber
reviews.text: I think they're a little spendy but maybe I'm disconnected from service plumbing prices today? At the same time, they were timely and professional.

reviews.author: Chris Catalano
reviews.text: The owner of the company came out on a Sunday to help us out. The dispatcher for the company was very responsive as well making some calls to get back to me. Very nice, easy to speak with, hard worker. The price was very reasonable and we will be using ClogPro again for any continued work on our properties.

reviews.author: Jeff Slinger
reviews.text: I was selling a house and needed a hydro-jet based on the home inspection.  Clog Pro was recommended by my realtor.  I got a quote of $239 per hour and scheduled an appointment.  Clog Pro showed up late.  Then the technician got out of the truck with a clipboard that had an hourly rate of $239 and an additional hourly rate of $179.  I questioned them about the additional $179 per hour and they stated regardless of the quote, they couldn't guarantee the work with out the additional cost.  After stating I didn't want to pay the additional amount and we should confirm with the office, the technician stormed off, got in his truck and left with an explanation.  I called another hydro-jet company and they professionally completed the work for their quoted amount (actually less than the $239).  Be careful of a low quote and extra charges.  I'm very disappointed about the hidden charges and the lack of professionalism.  Please be aware.

reviews.author: Andrew Weiher
reviews.text: Next day service to fix my clog, the plumber was professional and friendly, and the price was fair. I would definitely recommend them over other plumbers.

reviews.author: Lisa Yeo
reviews.text: ClogPro replaced sewer line from house to street August 10th, 2018 and did an exceptional job.  Everyone I came into contact with from the company was professional and pleasant and good at their job -- from the person who first took my call (Kim?), to Jesse who gave us an accurate cost estimate and answered all our questions, to Theresa who gave an accurate start date, to the crew who did the work -- Phil, Damien, Francisco and Gaspar. They used quality materials, with surebands at connection points, did not damage trees nor sidewalk nor curb.  I was amazed at how neatly they cleaned up the site when all was done. I highly recommend ClogPro!

reviews.author: Moper
reviews.text: Amazing job done by Robert !!! My husband was doing some remodeling and went to turn the main water supply off and the handle broke. Robert replaced the faucet in no time and had it up and running within 2 hours of the phone call. Very knowledgeable and skilled. Thank you !

reviews.author: Dio
reviews.text: It's no surprise they do quality work. Out of 10 plumbing companies I've called they're the only ones that actually picked up the phone to answer my call and address my issue with a major clogged bathroom sick. Now I know who to call for all my plumbing needs from now on and recommend them to family/friends. They were able to come to the house the next day I called which was great since my family does use the bathroom all the time. The lady on the phone was nice as well.

reviews.author: A D
reviews.text: Great service and reasonable price. Robert did an excellent job, Thank you Clog Pro!

reviews.author: Carol Fedak
reviews.text: 5 Stars!   Clog pro was great to work with.  Terese in the office was friendly and efficient.  Pricing was reasonable and their technicians were on time.  Overall a big win.  I recommend using Clog Pro.    Carol Fedak Property Manager Marketplace Homes

reviews.author: Spinnergirl
reviews.text: excellent service knew what they were doing fast friendly and reasonably priced would use them again and at this point and time would highly recommend them very pleased!!

reviews.author: Mike Will
reviews.text: Very impressed at how quickly they repaired and unclogged my drain.

reviews.author: Jenny Gager
reviews.text: I was really impressed the 1st time I had them come out.  The 2nd and 3rd time were really disapointing.  After playing he said she said with them about their 2nd visit, I didn't want to call them back when their 3rd visit repairs failed for a 4th visit.  It would have been really nice if their plumber would have educated me about my repair choices, but instead the repair failed and we you tubed how to fix the problem ourselves.  It would have been nice if their plumber advised the washer seats could be damaged so badly that they would just destroy their $200 worth of washers they installed.

reviews.author: Foggy Doggy
reviews.text: Y'all got employees complaining about having to work at the gas station, like c'mon kids, work means money and money is good

reviews.author: Adam Stites
reviews.text: I've used ClogPro for my Vancouver rental properties and my home.  I've worked with other plumbing firms, and these guys are miles ahead.  Don't waste your time with other emergency plumbers, just call ClogPro.  They've got the best equipment and a solid crew to quickly, and at a reasonable price, identify the root issue (pun intended in my case) and permanently fix your clog.  They can then verify that the lines are cleared with a camera.  The owners are active in the business, they're straightforward, do what they say they are going to do, efficient and results orientated.  My entire tub had to come out and Jesse even coordinated with an outside contractor do the sheetrock work he couldn't.  All around class act.

reviews.author: Jenna Roberts
reviews.text: Clog Pro sent Louis over and promised he was one of their best. I had an issue where I was told to cut a pipe to clear it by another plumber, but he was able to resolve it with just the jet. It was a great customer service experience.

reviews.author: sandy geer
reviews.text: I had a very good experience using Clog Pro plumbing. Lewis, the service technician was very efficient and unclogged my drain quickly. He also explained the problem. I will call this business again when a problem arises.

reviews.author: Barbara Baleilevuka
reviews.text: Excellent work, prompt, professional , courteous & effecient.Louis did not mind answering questions & explained cost expectation up front , even though this had been discussed with office while scheduling appt,  Cost reasonable, no increased.charge.for  weekend call!!  My sewer had backed up on a Friday after 5 pm, I located Clog Pro Plumbing on Angie's list.Local company with excellent rating.  I called left voicemail and received.call promptly Saturday morning to arrange repair.  Louis explained  process well,He was.able.ro go directly.to diagnosing the sewer issue without just starting with Laundry outlet clog that was backing up into shower & bubbling up in toilet. This saved cost.of this unclogging as would still need to unclog main sewer line. Once clogged area cleaned out ,the cause was explained & I could see this on screen with use of camera line, cullpret tree Roots! After these were removed ,amazing how they get broken down & wisked away.clear water.flowing , laundry,shower draining well,& no bubbling toilet! I appreciate the prompt response.to my call, courteous worker in Louis and care taken with what was around the sewer.line in case of foul water/debris backflow , my sewer.line goes under my back patio. I will be using Clog Pro again for maintenance for tree Roots assessment & some future plumping I have need of . I highly recommend this company.

reviews.author: Art M
reviews.text: Highly recommend - needed a clogged toilet cleared - answered the phone on a Sunday and indicated they would be able to come Monday morning. They called ahead to advise schedule - tech called when he was on his way - arrived on a timely basis - Lewis knew his stuff - was efficient - cleaned up - service the way it should be. Thank you.

reviews.author: Barbara Bell
reviews.text: We have a funny gurgling sound in our kitchen sink pipes and I called a plumber and they thought it was a drain problem and I was referred to Clog Pro Plumbing.  Within a few hours after my call to them  Louis was here to check out the problem.  Turns out it is a problem with our water filtration system so we have to call the people that do our service on that equipment.  While looking under the sink Louis noticed that the metal pipes were pitted and starting to rust out and need replacing. He asked which plumber referred him to us and then Louis kindly called the plumber for us and explained exactly what we needed and we made an appointment for them to come.  We are so impressed with their service, very polite and considerate,  and would highly recommend them if you need this type of service.  We thank you for so much for your help.  David and Barbara Bell

reviews.author: Sarah Schaffrath
reviews.text: Everything was great. Louis was very nice and informative. I'm very glad I came across Clog Pro Plumbing.

reviews.author: brent carpenter
reviews.text: Louis was great. Cleared the clog quickly.

reviews.author: Cindy Queen
reviews.text: Clog Pro was great. They sent Robert who was on time, very courtious and knowledgeable.  I was very impressed with his professionalism.

reviews.author: Aaron Krieger
reviews.text: As a tree service contractor I have worked closely with Jesse over the last few years now. Working with their company has been a breeze on my end and I have heard nothing less than happy endings from the dozens of customers I have encountered working with Clog Pro. Thank you for being such pleasurable and easy company to work with.

reviews.author: Gary Patterson
reviews.text: Completely professional. They thoroughly researched the problem.

reviews.author: Mark Ames
reviews.text: After discovering water seeping into our basement from a backed up rain drain, I called Clog Pro hoping they could send someone right away. Fortunately they had one of their crew on another job in my neighborhood, and within an hour, Patrick arrived and assessed the situation. He was able to quickly clear the clog, and was very professional from beginning to end. They did a great job and I would definitely use them again!

reviews.author: Hattie R
reviews.text: Had a clog in my washing machine drain line. Robert unclogged the drain in a very short time & very professional manner. Stuck around to verify the drain worked properly after several cycles of rinsing & draining. Thanks for such a professional job Robert. Would recommend your business to others.

reviews.author: H Wey
reviews.text: Louis is a great guy to work with.  He took time to explain to me what he is going to do. He respect home owner and communicate with home owner clearly.   While he was trying to open the lid to crawls space, he and I found that the lid was glued tigh by Portland Hardwoods by mistake. (We just put new wood floor in December last year)   After I called Portland Hardwoods and talked to the manager and found them are reluctant to come to fix their mistake, I asked Louie's to work without seeing the pipe layout underneath. With his decades experience, he is able to work with the hydro jet and turning direction correctly without even seeing the pipe in crawl space.   It is a good experience to work with Louis. Clog Pro is a good company with good reputation.

reviews.author: Carl
reviews.text: Patrick was prompt, efficient and friendly when he came to unclog our outside drain. I especially appreciated how he explained the problem and what he was doing to fix it.

reviews.author: Aran Adams
reviews.text: Awesome service from these guys. Patrick did a great job. Really nice guy; easy to talk to, listened well and got the job done with no fuss and no mess.

reviews.author: Chelsea Williams
reviews.text: They showed up on time. Called me before to let me know they were coming. Quickly identified the problem (a leaking pipe) and fixed it in about 20 minutes! Didn't try to gouge or overcharge me or sell me things I did not need. I will definitely be calling them if we have another problem!

reviews.author: Terry McCann
reviews.text: Dispatch kept me informed about plumber's arrival. They did a great job, clearing the drain, scoping and cleaned up. Helpful explaining what was going on.

reviews.author: Jack Hammer
reviews.text: If you have a really bad clog they may be the way to go, but you can get just a good work for a lot less than $175/hr plus a $20 truck charge if you want some regular plumbing work.

reviews.author: Chelsea Baun
reviews.text: Our technician, Louis, was very efficient and helpful. He fixed our clogged pipes quickly and explained preventative measures. We felt that the price was decent for a Sunday morning emergency. We would definitely recommend this company.

reviews.author: Sheila Donley
reviews.text: Louis was great. He described what he was going to do and then cleaned that drain quickly and efficiently. That sink was certainly fast draining when he was done! Thanks, Louis.

reviews.author: Cole Blackburn
reviews.text: Louis from Clog Pro was great.  He showed up quickly and got the job done efficiently. He was able to fix a gnarly clog inside of the wall behind my bathroom sink.  It's so nice to not have to brush my teeth in the kitchen anymore haha. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: SarahJane Gardner
reviews.text: I am SO IMPRESSED with Clog Pro!  The price was well worth the result!! When calling for a estimate, the customer service representative was polite, friendly, and informative, without even a hint of rudeness. He was clear about service options they provided, explaining how each type of technique worked,  and the base price for each service.   My service appointment went wonderful. Knowing the service technician, Louis, was coming from another call, I expected him and his equipment to be a mess. When he pulled up, his truck and equipment were clean, tidy, and in good shape. Not only did he arrive clean and on time, was he was polite, respectful, and professionally dressed. He happily answered all my questions, and explained what he was doing as I watched him work.   All three of my gutter drains were clear in short order. Loius collected his equipment, wrote out the paperwork, and was on his way in under an hour.   If I ever have another drain issue, Clog Pro will be my go to guys. Thank you so much for your great service and hard work!

reviews.author: Barbara Detrick
reviews.text: Excellent!  Efficient, friendly and informative.   Pricing was much less than expected.   Thanks Louis.

reviews.author: Steven Castellano
reviews.text: Great quick and efficient service.  Would highly recommend.

reviews.author: Mike Matson
reviews.text: It took a little while to coordinate a an appointment but things happen and Luis the driver of the truck deserves a raise he is an outstanding employee experience is all good

reviews.author: Lamont Dabbs
reviews.text: I had a backup in my bathroom where the toilet backed up in to the bathtub and the sink and tub drained super slow.  I called clog pro while another plumbing company was at my house to fix the mess that had created which resolved neither of my plumbing issues.   Clog pro sent Louis. Louis resolved my plumbing issues in twenty minutes a task the other company couldn't do in the two hours they were at my house. Louis is a great asset to your company. He knows what he is talking about and educates and updates you about your plumbing issues.  We will always use Clog pro

reviews.author: Laura Raypush
reviews.text: Dan H. did a fantastic job repairing a leaking pipe at my home.  It was located in a very tight spot and Dan did a great job inspecting everything to find the best way to replace the leaking section. He worked quickly and was done in an hour!  Thank you so very much!

reviews.author: Nick Wylde
reviews.text: While we were out on vacation our main water pipe ruptured. MJ and Clog Pro did an absolutely amazing job on time and within budget. They were great in follow ups and keeping communication opened!  These are my new plumbers in the area and I would definitely recommend them to anyone!

reviews.author: Brian Malella
reviews.text: My name is Brian.  I am a Marine serving in North Carolina but I have a rental in Vancouver.   Most reviews I leave or letters I write regarding businesses are based on negative experiences.  This review is different.  I don’t care if it is a law firm, mechanic shop, real estate firm or plumbing company, we all know that the main goal of a business is to make money; however, nothing earns my loyalty like evidence that the person I hire puts their customer’s best interests over their own profit margins.  Terese at Clog Pro did this for me when she saved me over $5,000 this year.  This was a huge expense that did not fall under insurance and I had to pay for out of pocket.  I had already made payment to Clog Pro when I received a surprise phone call by Terese, telling me that I am having my money refunded due to Clog Pro negotiating with the city on my behalf.  The city fixed the problem free of charge.  Clog Pro could have charged me, completed the job, and made some money.  Instead, they looked out for me at their own expense.  That says so much!!! Some businesses make their money by price gouging one-time customers in volume.  Other businesses make their money by taking great care of their clients and building a business off of a well-earned reputation and attracting customers that are intelligent enough to seek out this value.  It is clear to me what kind of company Clog Pro is from this experience.  Hopefully I won’t have any plumbing problems soon, but when I do, I will know who to call.  Thanks again Terese!

reviews.author: Randy Ferguson
reviews.text: Louis Griffith provided my service, which was very professional, quick, and friendly. Based on my experience, I highly recommend this company.

reviews.author: Steve Duquette
reviews.text: Robert was very efficient clearing a clog with the jetter in my mainline sewer then cleaning out the bathtub drain with a smaller auger.  did it all in under one hour.  Much less than other estimates I had .  Thanks

reviews.author: Tamme Racine
reviews.text: From our first phone call to the completion of our drain problem, Clog Pro has been a wonderful company to work with.  The young lady on the phone answered all of my questions and was extremely pleasant.  Louis Griffith was the specialist who came to our home and he was very knowledgeable, courteous and helpful.  He took the time to answer all our questions thoroughly and honestly.  We never had the feeling he was trying to get more business or provide services we didn't need.  He gave us recommendations on how to properly take care of our septic and the next steps we should take.  We will definitely use this company again!!  Aaron and Tammy

reviews.author: Bagley Estates Apartments
reviews.text: Clog pro has the technicians with knowledge and the tools to get the job done. Louis Griffith was smart, quick and easy to talk to. He found the problem with the inline camera and fixed it quickly. This is his third time out over the past year or so. Always consistent and clean work. Thanks Loius! I would recommend clog pro to anyone.   ~Layne mgr

reviews.author: Marian Adams
reviews.text: Loius  (Griffith) was fantastic!  He showed up on time and worked fast to get the job finished before we opened our restaurant.  I would highly recommend him & Clog Pro to anyone.

reviews.author: Clare Clancy
reviews.text: Clog Pro is fantastic! Louis G. went above and beyond in his service. Highly recommend them!

reviews.author: Brian Whitmer
reviews.text: Clog Pro did a cleaning of my line to remove some gunk and tree roots so that they could get the camera down 165 feet of sewer line to give a video of my entire line. I had paid another company twice to do a scope and they were unable to get it down the line due to the number of turns. Louis was able to get the video I needed. He was clearly a professional at what he does, quickly solving a couple of issues that popped up. I will hire them again to take care of anything my sewer needs.

reviews.author: Christine Cromwell
reviews.text: Don came right on time, and even before he came Clog Pro called to tell me he was on the way.  He quickly replaced my supply line and checked out other things such as dishwasher to make sure everything was good.  Totally professional, friendly and efficient.  I highly recommend Clog Pro!

reviews.author: Brent Clair
reviews.text: Great service, quick response.

reviews.author: Miriam Mason
reviews.text: We had a plugged toilet, plugged with huge handfuls of toilet paper by an over-enthusiastic child.  We only have one other bathroom, and the toilet in that one isn't very strong, so we needed someone as quickly as possible.  We called Clog Pro and immediately liked their customer service.  We had previously called another company we worked with, but they were hedging on getting someone out to us that day, which would really have left us in the lurch.  After I called Clog Pro, I called the other company back and cancelled our order with them. I called Clog Pro at 11 am, and they had someone out to us between 3 and 5 that day.  Don showed up right at the earliest possible time.  He gave us up front charges for what he thought it would be (hoping we didn't have to remove the toilet, which we did not) and then snaked the huge wad of toilet paper until it finally broke through.  The toilet was unclogged within 10 minutes of his arrival.  He also suggested that part of the blockage could be mechanical issues inside the toilet so he checked inside the lid and found a worn part ready to be replaced that could be responsible for less powerful flushing, and he offered to fix it for an extra $7 dollars.  We took him up on the kind offer and since then, the toilet's working better than it has in years.  The entire repair took less than a half an hour and came out to less than we had anticipated.  We are grateful to Clog Pro and to Don (ask for him, he's cool) for responding so quickly and working through the problem in no time flat.  He was a pleasure to work with and I'd highly recommend him and this company for your plumbing issues.  They're fast, have great customer service, and Don is a great plumber.    Nobody wants to have to call a plumber, but should the need again arise, we know we'll be calling these folks and asking for Don.

reviews.author: Wendy Weng
reviews.text: It has been cold and wet outside. Having a leaking garden hose faucet is like adding oil to the fire. I was concerned about frozen pipe and wasting water. A handyman did not and could not fix the problem.  Don, the technician from Clog Pro, came to rescue. He came to my house on time, fully equipped, and ready to work. He was respectful, knowledgeable, and skillful. He looked at the problem and discussed options with my including saving my money and doing the  best job for me. He explained the process of fixing the problem in a way that I could understand and made sure all my questions were answered. He finished job by explaining the care for the faucet, cleaning the site, and thanking me. I had been very happy with the job he had done and would strongly recommend him for all the plumbing needs you might have. thank you, Don, for your professional services. Wendy

reviews.author: Valentine Wiggin
reviews.text: I had a great experience with Chris-- he was professional, kind, efficient, and did a great job on my home while at the same time explaining things simply and easily so I can keep up an easy maintenance plan for the future. I would definitely recommend them and use them again!

reviews.author: Kelli Waldo
reviews.text: Don came to snake the basement drain.  We had a scheduled appointment,  and when his arrival was delayed,  we received multiple calls to update us on timing.  Don was knowledgeable,  professional,  and effective.  I highly recommend ClogPro!

reviews.author: Nancy Layral-Tate
reviews.text: Chris B & Dwayne W were professional, informative and friendly.  Work completed to my satisfaction, in a timely manner.  Although they didn't have the toilet handle on their vehicle, they advised me what to purchase and how to install it easily, which I did the next day.  Thank you guys....I've had no further problems.      My only suggestion...please offer a senior discount, for those of us on a fixed income.  A 5 or 10% discount would have been helpful.

reviews.author: Tanner Scott
reviews.text: I called Clog Pro after our sewer line was backed up, and was able to get an appointment the next day. Chris and Dwayne showed up right on time and diagnosed the problem and found the right way to fix it. They explain everything they were doing and the cost for each step. They took their time to unclog the line and to double check that everything was clear. They explained what other services they offered but didn't push in any way to have them done. They were both very professional and nice to talk to. I will be calling them back for any other plumbing service we need in the future.

reviews.author: Latasha Risner
reviews.text: I called ClogPro to come out and look at my overflowing toilet. I was charged 175 just to take off the toilet (at the time I didn't know I was getting ripped off, I'm not a plumber) and 300 to snake the toilet. After a week it overflowed again so I called them to come back. My appointment was from 10am to 12pm so I waited around all day without a working bathroom just for him to show up at 3pm and say he didn't know what was wrong and that he would need to come back the next day with a camera. At that point I was fed up and I called another plumber who was here right on time and told me my septic tank was full. I called around and every plumber I talk to says they overcharged me....by a lot. They just charge what they can get away with.

reviews.author: Joanne Hodges
reviews.text: Clog Pro quickly removed the clog in the kitchen.  Chris was friendly, courteous, and thorough.  I will certainly use Clog Pro again in the future.

reviews.author: Tim Tetz
reviews.text: Chris was professional.  He arrived on time, was patient w/ the tenants, diagnosed the problem, and returned the next morning to fix it (on his day off).

reviews.author: Edna Keller
reviews.text: Louis Griffith did a very good job. We are always happy with his work.

reviews.author: Diana McDonald
reviews.text: Fast, friendly service. Very accommodating.

reviews.author: Andrew Berkowitz
reviews.text: Outstanding service. We called at 9 a.m. on a Sunday, the receptionist was helpful and friendly, Chris B was at our place before 10, had the problem diagnosed within minutes and fixed in a half hour. He was polite, communicated everything clearly and even cleaned up the mess the clog had made. Very good experience.

reviews.author: John Chotia
reviews.text: Chris B. Came in for a clogged kitchen sink. Saw that the plumbing had been done wrong. Which, I already knew about, just bought the home. He was very professional, got it fixed quickly and cleanly. He arrived dead center of the 2 hour window we were given.  Clog pro called us as well to let us know he was on his way and gave an accurate eta. The most you can expect from a service call. No weekend charge with these guys either.

reviews.author: Jack Mowreader
reviews.text: very responsive, call them if you need immediate assistance.

reviews.author: Andy Bordeaux
reviews.text: Our experience with ClogPro has been great: super responsive, very friendly, great customer service, competitive rates.  After 10+ years in our house we have recently had a 3 or 4 few plumbing problems arise.  I always began by dialing down the list for local plumbers and ClogPro always seemed to be able to squeeze us in several days before any of the other companies.  Not only that, but they were able to find and fix problems very quickly compared to plumbers we have used in the past.  Within minutes of walking inot our house, ClogPro owner Marsh immediately diagnosed an unusual problem previous plumbers were completely unable to figure out.  He pinpointed the precise area of the problem and when he used a camera to take a look, sure enough, he found an old 20+ ft cable left in the pipe by some previous plumber or builder.  Now the system runs better than ever.    I won't be dialing for plumbers in the future... ClogPro will be my first call.  Great job!

reviews.author: Matt Bepler
reviews.text: After being unable to reach a few other local plumbers, I called Clog Pro this morning with our semi-emergency. We had turned off our water main last night due to a kitchen "incident". They answered their phone right away, and were able to get someone out this morning. Chris fixed the urgent issue, and was very helpful answering all my questions and then some. Our water was back on before noon. Jesse came out this afternoon to clean out our kitchen drain since that had also been backing up in disposal and dishwasher. All said and done, it was a very professional experience, and I would recommend them.

reviews.author: Kimberley Karstedt
reviews.text: Just bought our first house in July of this year. Had an issue with our water not draining and backing up. Called Clog Pro and the gals in the office were great. Explained our situation and they were able to dispatch someone immediately. They were even kind enough to call us back to let us know when someone would be here. Jesse showed up and got the job done. He was great with the explanation of what was going on, and what we needed to do. Great company! Excellent customer service. Highly recommend and will use if and when we have any other issues. Thank you, Clog Pro and Jesse!

reviews.author: Jonathan Drake
reviews.text: We purchased our home a couple years ago and have always had issues with our spare bathroom. With a pre-schooler at home and a baby on the way we knew it was time to have it taken care of.  I am so glad that I called Clog Pro! Being in an industry myself where customer service is important, I cannot explain how impressed I am with Clog Pro. They answered the phone right away, quickly got me set up with an appointment the next day, called when they were on the way to my house and were incredibly prompt.   They quickly diagnosed and resolved our issues, all while being personable and professional. I am so thankful that I called Clog Pro and I will definitely recommend them to any and all of my friends and family!

reviews.author: Christina Keys
reviews.text: I love the guys and gals at clog pro especially Chris .. They have helped us out twice now and both time excellent job and great service... Love having a company I can trust and recommend... Thanks for such a great job!!!

reviews.author: William Jensen
reviews.text: This is the third time that I have used Clog Pro, and they are outstanding. Jesse is one of the best plumbing professionals I have has the pleasure of using.  Bill Jensen

reviews.author: Katie Agmata
reviews.text: Jesse came to our house on time and ready to fix our back-up.  He was up front on what the estimate would be and got the job done quickly.  Will use Clog Pro in the future.

reviews.author: MYSTERIOUS LIFE
reviews.text: These guys were awsome!! We had 2 toilets and a sink replaced and Marsh (the owner) and his team were very professional and very warm. They did a great job and were always on time. I would use them for all my plumbing needs again in the future. Thanks again ClogPro!
